db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates the use of baked lightmaps in a 3D scene.

db:article.db:programlisting:
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16) project(bakedlightmap LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
if(NOT DEFINED INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR) set(INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR "examples") endif()
set(INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR "${INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR}/quick3d/bakedlightmap")
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Quick Quick3D)
qt_add_executable(bakedlightmap main.cpp )
# Do not set WIN32_EXECUTABLE, we want a console set_target_properties(bakedlightmap PROPERTIES MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE )
target_link_libraries(bakedlightmap PUBLIC Qt::Core Qt::Gui Qt::Quick Qt::Quick3D )
qt_add_qml_module(bakedlightmap URI Example VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES main.qml Box.qml RESOURCES box.mesh qlm_box.exr NO_RESOURCE_TARGET_PATH )
install(TARGETS bakedlightmap RUNTIME DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" BUNDLE DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" LIBRARY DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" )
